item.title: Compile Error [HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @boloros boloros
item.description:
@boloros wrote:

I get this error every time I try to compile my NPChandler.java

Im trying to change my NPC direction with this:

if (newNPC.npcType == 494) { if ((newNPC.absX == 3090) && (newNPC.absY == 3244)) { newNPCTurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX + 2, newNPC.absY); } }

This is my NPC handler:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34447976/NPCHandler.zip
